text: Dennis Michael Richardson (July 30, 1949 - February 26, 2019) was an American politician. On January 2, 2017, he became the 26th Secretary of State of Oregon. He was the Republican candidate for Governor of Oregon in the 2014 Oregon gubernatorial election. Richardson was born in Los Angeles, California. He studied at Brigham Young University. He served in the Oregon House of Representatives from 2003 to 2015. In May 2018, Richardson was diagnosed with glioblastoma, a rare form of brain cancer. He died on February 26, 2019 from the disease in Central Point, Oregon, aged 69."Oregon Secretary of State Dennis Richardson dies of cancer," The Oregonian, Feb. 27, 2019, www.oregonlive.com/ ==References== ==Other websites== * Oregon Secretary of State * Campaign website Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from Oregon Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:Lawyers from Oregon Category:Military people from California
title: Dennis Richardson
